title: Ranked players
body:
Hey guys, first off if you're a person with high mmr then disregard me, I was in silver last season and deserved it, however as I am pretty done with people who treat ranked like norms I am looking for others who would enjoy playing with me! I have skype and am on a lot at the moment since uni is still out, and I am pretty relaxed. Generally play jg/support, but I can also top fairly well also. IGN romeopm
 Be my Senpai and guide me through the land of trolls that is League of Legends.{{summoner:21}}
